control.name: Use SSL to Encrypt the connection to a DB Instance
control.desc: Use SSL from your application to encrypt a connection to a DB instance running MySQL, MariaDB, Amazon Aurora, SQL Server, Oracle, or PostgreSQL. Each DB engine has its own process for implementing SSL. To learn how to implement SSL for your particular DB instance, please see link provided in "References" section.

test.steps: Check that the SSL protocol is used to encrypt the data in transit.
